== Description ==
Creates a new, empty blog. 

== Usage ==
%%%<?php create_empty_blog( $domain, $path, $weblog_title, $site_id ) ?>%%%
== Parameters ==
{{Parameter|$domain|string|Domain name for blog.}}
{{Parameter|$path|string|Path to the blog.}}
{{Parameter|$weblog_title|string|Title for blog.}}
{{Parameter|$site_id|int|Site ID, if running multiple networks.|optional|1}}

== Returns ==
{{Return||integer|The ID of the newly created blog}}
